content: Might it make sense to have some OS-specific streams for common OSes (e.g. #os/windows, #os/macos, os/linux), for people who aren't experts in a given OS to find folks who are?
There's already t-compiler/windows, maybe create more if needed?

This kind of ties into https://rust-lang.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/217588-project-leads.20(public)/topic/Rust.20Interest.20Groups and having "official" spaces for more general rust discussion channels. I'm in favour of having more channels in general.
